de.ovgu.featureide.core.runtime

Class RuntimeParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.ComposerExtensionClass
      • de.ovgu.featureide.core.runtime.RuntimeParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.IComposerExtensionBase, de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.IComposerExtensionClass, de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.IExtension

    public class RuntimeParameters
extends de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.ComposerExtensionClass
    RuntimeComposer creates .property-file from actual configuration or writes arguments from .config file into the program arguments of Eclipse Run Configuration.
    Author:
    Kai Wolf, Matthias Quaas

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize(de.ovgu.featureide.core.IFeatureProject project)
        When initialized, the PropertyManager class will be created within the runtime project, if it does not already exist. The PropertyManager.java is located in de.ovgu.featureide.core.runtime/resources.
